definition: (of the Moon) pertaining to the period during which the visible surface of the moon decreases, a gradual decrease in magnitude or extent
details:
adjective
- (of the Moon) pertaining to the period during which the visible surface of the moon decreases
= example: (of the Moon) pertaining to the period during which the visible surface of the moon decreases
noun
- a gradual decrease in magnitude or extent
= example: a gradual decrease in magnitude or extent
